QuantityItemsObject.description: A value object to encapsulate generic quantity of something against an identifiable object - e.g qty of product in delivery parcel, or an exchange line reference to qty on a new line

Qty.description: The quantity of items if this bundle

ItemType.description: The type of the qty bundle as will be either product related or order, so this specifies the exact detail e.g Product, ProductVariant, SaleOrderLine, PurchaseOrderLine

ProductId.description: The Xfuze product Id, if the quantity bundle refers to product

ProductKeyType.description: The type of the product key e.g SKU, EAN, UPC etc

LineId.description: The order line Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying this sales o

LineNumberKey.description: The 'natural' order line number key e.g 123456789_1

LineSeq.description: The ordinal line sequence number e.g 1
